definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Among the horses on sale he saw his own horse.
sentences.chinese: 在出售的马群中，他发现了自己的那匹马。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from volcanic ash April 17, 2010 near Eyjafjallajokull, Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛艾雅法拉火山附近马群逃离火山灰。

sentences.english: One of the management measures being considered is to cull the herd; there are tens of thousands of them out there.
sentences.chinese: 一种在考虑的措施是精减马群，那有成千上万的马呢。

sentences.english: Hendra virus can cause severe disease and death in horses.
sentences.chinese: 亨德拉病毒可在马群中导致严重疾病和死亡。

sentences.english: The horses dashed out of burning stable.
sentences.chinese: 马群猛冲出着了火的马厩。

sentences.english: We must cut out the sick horses from the herd.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须把病马从马群中剔除。

sentences.english: Emperor's horses at Mürzsteg, lower Austria.
sentences.chinese: 下奥地利慕尔斯泰格的御用马群。

sentences.english: The king had huge stables with very large herds of cattle.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯国王的马群非常大，所以他有一个巨大的马厩。

sentences.english: Solomon's horses were imported from Egypt and from all other countries.
sentences.chinese: 有人从埃及和各国为所罗门赶马群来。

definition: to urge on a horse using a whip or spurs
